text: The Japanese farmers protect green vegetables by enclosing them with ultra-durable wire mesh that can even hold the weight of bricks. Meanwhile, in China a special black mat is placed under tree roots during planting. This mat locks in soil moisture and blocks weeds, ensuring healthy growth but

Meanwhile, in China a special black mat is placed under tree roots during planting.
